Classes in org.ndnx.ndn.impl.security.keys used by org.ndnx.ndn
PublicKeyCache
          This class performs the following: - manages published public keys
SecureKeyCache
          A container for our private keys and other secret key material that we have retrieved (e.g. from access control).
 

Classes in org.ndnx.ndn.impl.security.keys used by org.ndnx.ndn.impl.security.keys
BasicKeyManager
          This is a basic implementation of key manager, which reads its keying information from a Java keystore.
KeyServer
          A small class to handle publishing keys to NDNx, without requiring a repository to be present.
KeyStoreInfo
          Track a set of information about keystore files that we load, so that we can use it (e.g. versioning) for representing those keys in NDN, or storing related configuration data in the same directory.
NetworkKeyManager
          This is a network-based implementation of key manager.
PublicKeyCache
          This class performs the following: - manages published public keys
SecureKeyCache
          A container for our private keys and other secret key material that we have retrieved (e.g. from access control).
 

Classes in org.ndnx.ndn.impl.security.keys used by org.ndnx.ndn.utils
BasicKeyManager
          This is a basic implementation of key manager, which reads its keying information from a Java keystore.
